attributes.action: The free bus passes for the elderly/disabled and vunerable should start earlier
attributes.additional_details: many people haven't got the means of transports to get their essential supplies.
attributes.background: Change the times of the free bus passes in the morning from 9:30am to earlier so the elderly, disabled and vunerable can take advantage of those shops that are opening earlier for them.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
